messages.content: You can trust Alistair and the Lib Dems to keep us in the EU and focus on your priorities, instead of years more Brexit chaos. Alistair wants to work with local communities and in Parliament to make Oxford East fairer and more prosperous for everyone.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We're all sick of the Brexit lies and indecision. The Tories are getting help from Farage. Labour hasn't decided whether it wants to stop Brexit or not. The Lib Dems want to end the chaos, and use the £50 billion Remain Bonus that will be saved to invest in public services.

Reducing carbon emissions should be the top priority for the world, the UK and Oxford. The Lib Dems have a radical, realistic plan to cut emissions urgently, while protecting vulnerable people and communities, creating new jobs and helping global progress.

Oxford's schools, health services, infrastructure, police and Council services are all underfunded. The Lib Dems will invest extra money wisely based on evidence of where it is most needed, including struggling areas like mental health and Special Educational Needs.

Many people in Oxford are struggling with the cost of living in the most unaffordable city in the UK. High housing and childcare costs are most people's top concerns. We need to build new housing – fairer taxes on land and targeted support to help them.

Politics in the UK isn't working. Trust in politicians is low, they make late promises and don't keep them. With a new system for fairer voting, politics will improve for real competition and better communication. The Lib Dems want to promote collaboration not fracture, work together and move forward on outdated institutions.

issues.brexitEurope: You can trust Alistair and the Lib Dems to keep us in the EU and focus on your priorities, instead of years more Brexit chaos. The Tories are getting help from Farage. Labour hasn't decided whether it wants to stop Brexit or not. The Lib Dems want to stop Brexit as soon as possible.
issues.economy: We'll use the £50 billion Remain Bonus to invest in public services, including reducing the cost of high housing and childcare.
issues.education: Oxford's schools, health services, infrastructure, police and Council services are all underfunded. The Lib Dems will invest extra money wisely based on evidence of where it is most needed, including struggling areas like mental health and Special Educational Needs.

issues.government: The Lib Dems want to implement a new system for fairer voting.
issues.health: Oxford's health services are underfunded. The Lib Dems will invest extra money wisely based on evidence of where it is most needed, including struggling areas like mental health.
